target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_SEQ_00<tab>ポルタ・プレトリアのラウバーンは、ついに動こうとしているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Raubahn's package to Pipin.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_00<tab>ピピンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D0C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_01<tab>Follow Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_01<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Hakuro.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_02<tab>ハクロウと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_03<tab>Report to Pipin.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_TODO_03<tab>ピピンと話す

target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_SERPENTOFFICER_000_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>I have asked Urianger to look after Krile. He will keep her out of harm's way. Though, after what she has endured, her physical well-being may be the least of our worries...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>クルルさんのことは、ウリエンジェに頼んでおいた。
今は異変がなくても被検体として、監禁されていたんだ。
体調の急変に備えておきたくてね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_URIANGER_000_015<tab>Worry not for her safety. Look thee to the east.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_URIANGER_000_015<tab>後方のことは、どうか私にお任せを……。
あなたは前だけを見ていてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_020<tab>Right, then. I must go to my men. I shall be leading the first charge through the breach.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_020<tab>よし、各国の軍勢が出撃した今、
残すところは吾輩が率いる突入部隊のみか……。
最終確認が完了次第、配置に就かせるとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Then we shall head to the front.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>では、私たちも前線の部隊と合流します。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_022<tab>Pipin has command of our artillery outside the gate. He'll not be hard to find.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_022<tab>うむ、固く閉ざされた正門をこじ開けるために、
ピピンが、アラミゴの玄関口たる陸橋に陣取っているはずだ。
そこに合流してくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_023<tab>Ah, but before you go, I have a final favor to ask.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_023<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、貴様に頼みがある。
この包みを「ピピン」に渡してくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_024<tab>Give this to my son. He will understand.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_024<tab>何が入っているのかは、あえて言うまい。
ヤツならば、これを受け取ることで吾輩の真意を悟るだろう。
……では、次は戦場で会おうぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_025<tab>There's no need for explanations. When he sees it, he will know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_025<tab>例の包みを「ピピン」に渡すのを、忘れずにな……。
頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>'Twould seem our position here is secure...
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>どうやら無事に正門前を確保できたようだね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_040<tab><var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>, Alphinaud. Hm? What is that you've got there?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>殿、アルフィノ殿、来てくれたか。
む……その重そうな包みを、義父上が私に……？

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_041<tab>By the Twelve, this is...this is Tizona!
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_041<tab>こ、これは……ティソーナではないか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>The Bull of Ala Mhigo's legendary sword, forged from two cursed blades...
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>ティソーナと言えば、ラウバーン局長が愛用する二剣一対の呪剣！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_043<tab>This sword is a symbol of everything my father fought to achieve. A weapon claimed on the bloodsands, and with it fortune and glory. Its flames consume the unworthy, but by fire was he reborn.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_043<tab>そうだ、かつて義父上がコロセウムでの戦いで、
宿敵より譲り受けた、炎の魔力を宿した呪剣だ。
その片方を私に……。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_044<tab>That he should bequeath it to me now...to carry on his legacy...
Well, I shall endeavor to deserve it. But I'll be damned if this is his final battle!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_044<tab>失った腕に代わる使い手として、見込んでくれたということか……
義父上の信頼に、必ずや応えて見せようぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_050<tab>Once we begin, there will be no respite until it's over. Are you ready, my friends?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_050<tab>さて、お二方、いよいよ正門の突破に取りかかることになるが、
覚悟はよろしいか？

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_051<tab>Very well. Brace yourselves. This should be quite a specta─
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_051<tab>どうやら、準備は万全、気合も充分のようだな。
よし、では始めるとしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_FLAMEHERALD_000_052<tab>Vice Marshal! Vice Marshal! Imperial unit approaching from the north!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_FLAMEHERALD_000_052<tab>偵察部隊より緊急報告！
アラミゴの城壁北より、帝国軍部隊が出撃したとのこと！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_053<tab>Aiming to destroy our artillery, are they? How many?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_053<tab>砲列を攻撃するつもりか！
敵部隊の数は！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_FLAMEHERALD_000_054<tab>Total numbers unconfirmed. At least one squadron. But sir─they're wolfmen!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_FLAMEHERALD_000_054<tab>確認されたのは先鋒役と思しき、小隊規模の部隊ですが、
いずれも、手練れで知られる人狼族のようです！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_055<tab>Ferae Domitae. Bloody hells, that's all we need. Call up the Bloodsworn. Tell them to make ready─
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_055<tab>チッ……少数精鋭の部隊を送り込んで、
こちらを揺さぶるつもりか……だが、させるものか！
こちらも精鋭のブラッドソーン隊を送り込んで撃滅せよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>Marshal Tarupin, wait!
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_056<tab>ピピン少闘将、お待ちください！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_057<tab>These “wolfmen” of whom you speak hail from Doma. They were <var 1A 02 /var>coerced<var 1A 01 /var> into fighting for the Empire─spirited away to a foreign land and told that if they disobeyed, the lives of their kin would be forfeit.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_057<tab>人狼族と言えば、ドマが治めるヤンサ地方の獣人種族……
故郷に残してきた家族を人質に取られ、強制的に戦わされている、
徴用兵だと思われます。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_058<tab>But their homeland has been liberated. They have no reason to continue serving their imperial masters!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_058<tab>おそらく、ドマが解放されたことも知らされていないのでしょう。
ならば、説得すれば退いてくれる可能性があります！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>Ere you engage them in battle, I beseech you: grant us a moment to go and attempt to convince them to lay down their arms!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>ブラッドソーン隊は、アラミゴ王宮攻略の要となる戦力……
ここでいたずらに消耗させるわけにはいきません！
ドマ解放戦に参加した私に、どうか説得のチャンスを！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_060<tab>I am loath to gift our enemy more time to prepare...but if there is a chance that this conflict might be avoided, I suppose we must take it. Go then─but be quick.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_060<tab>……確かに、ここで主力の損耗は避けたい。
アルフィノ殿と<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>殿に、
人狼部隊への対応を一任しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>We will, Vice Marshal.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_061<tab>ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_100_061<tab>With me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_100_061<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、すぐに北へと向かおう。
無益な殺し合いを止めるぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>I dream of a day when people accept my words as truth without demanding that I prove them through feats of strength. But come, we must away.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_065<tab>戦いの中で真実を見極めようとは、
さすがは武の民として知られる人狼族だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_100_065<tab>Our scouts report that the wolfmen are advancing on our position from the north of the city. Convince them to retreat, or we will have no choice but to engage.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_100_065<tab>人狼部隊は、アラミゴ城壁の北方より進軍して来る。
アルフィノ殿と共に、彼らを説得してくれ。
頼んだぞ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>殿！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_066<tab>We will wait here for the Lupin to arrive. Steel yourself, my friend. Though I hope to resolve this without resorting to violence, it would seem wise to prepare for the worst...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_066<tab>この辺りで、人狼族を待ち受けよう！
小規模の部隊とは聞いたが、説得交渉に失敗すれば、
戦いになりかねない……準備はいいね？

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>They come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>来たぞ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！
間違いない、人狼族の部隊だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_111<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)You! Clear the road!
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_111<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)そこをどけ、小僧！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_112<tab>Honorable warriors of Doma! My name is Alphinaud Leveilleur, and I come before you with news of great import─
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_112<tab>ドマより徴集された人狼族のツワモノとお見受けします！
私の名はアルフィノ……どうか話をお聞きください！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_112<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Silence, boy! You stand upon a battlefield. Begone, or be cut down!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_112<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)黙れ、小童！
子どもを斬るつもりはない、戦場（いくさば）より去れぃ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_113<tab>Doma is free! Lord Hien has returned and driven Yotsuyu and the imperials from your lands! We were there─we helped him! There is no need for you to fight for Zenos!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_113<tab>貴方がたの祖国、ドマは帝国の支配より解放されました！
私たちはヒエン殿と共に戦い、ヨツユを討ったのです！
もう帝国軍のために、命を賭す必要などないのですッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_114<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Lord Hien is dead, and you are a liar! What could a boy such as you do against magitek? Throw stones and spit curses!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_114<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)世迷い言を！
我らが力を以て成せなかったことを、
貴様らのような小僧が成せると、信じると思うかッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_114<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Invoke my lord's name again at your peril. We will suffer no falsehoods!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_114<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)あげく主君カイエン様が嫡男、
ヒエン様の名を騙るなど許しがたいッ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_200_114<tab>I speak only the truth! Put up your weapons, I beg of you! Let us speak as friends and not shed blood in vain!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_200_114<tab>断じて嘘などではッ！
どうか、その刃をお収めください！
無駄に血を流す必要がどこにあるというのですッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_300_114<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)If your claims were true, we would gladly sheathe our blades and embrace as brothers.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_300_114<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)その言葉が真であれば、確かに我らに戦う理由はない……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_115<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)But since they must surely be false, we would be traitors to accept! Our lives and those of our loved ones, forfeit!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_115<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)しかしッ！！
その言葉に偽りあれば、帝国軍は我らを裏切り者と断じ、
祖国ドマに残してきた血族は、無残に殺されよう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_116<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)Words are air! You will prove the truth of your tale on the battlefield, or die in dishonor!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_116<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)だが、どこまでも誠であると豪語するつもりなら、
祖国ドマを救ったという力で、我らを止め、
証明してみせよッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_117<tab>(-Ferae Domitae Centurion-)You are no strangers to battle, that much is plain...
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_117<tab>(-人狼族の百人隊長-)ふむ、雑兵では勝負にならんか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_118<tab>I am the White. I am Hakuro! And I will be your opponent! Have at you!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_118<tab>では、このハクロウ自らが相手になってやろう。
思う存分、刃を交えようぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_070<tab>You fought with honor and restraint. You could have killed my men, and perhaps even me...but you did not. For this, I thank you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_070<tab>貴様たちの戦いぶり、
確かにドマの侍とともに戦ったことのある動き……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_071<tab>Warriors brave and true. I pray you tell us of the battle for Doma's liberation.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_071<tab>何より、我らの命を奪おうとはせぬ戦いぶり、信じねばなるまい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>We should be glad to do so...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_072<tab>お話ししましょう、
ドマで何があったのかを……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_073<tab>...Lord Hien, returned! Such joy this news brings us.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_073<tab>ヒエン様の帰還、誠であったか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_074<tab>But for Lord Gosetsu to perish in the keep's collapse...to be taken from us by such treachery... There is no justice...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_074<tab>しかして、ゴウセツ殿は……。
いや、よき死に場を得たと言うべきか。
それに比べて、我らは……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_Q1_000_075<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_Q1_000_075<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_A1_000_076<tab>Eyes forward, Hakuro. He wished for no better death.
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_A1_000_076<tab>今は後悔の時ではない

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_078<tab>You knew him well. Aye, he would not suffer us to mourn with so much undone. And so we will not. Duty comes before all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_078<tab>一度、帝国の走狗となる屈辱に甘んじたのであれば、
今さら生き恥をさらしたと悔やむ身ですらないか……。
我ら侍衆……大将の遺志を継いで、立ち上がらねばなるまいな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_079<tab>But I knew the man, and he would not suffer us to mourn on the eve of this great battle. Duty comes before all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_000_079<tab>……いや、悔いるはゴウセツ殿に失礼か。
我ら侍衆……大将の遺志を継いで、立ち上がらねばなるまいな！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_079<tab>All Lupin shall know of Doma's liberation, and of your part in it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_100_079<tab>我ら、これよりアラミゴ王宮へと退き、
仲間たちにもドマ解放の真実を伝えよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_200_079<tab>When you breach the gates, we shall turn on the imperials as one. With fang and claw shall we rip open the throats of our masters. This the White swears.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_200_079<tab>そして、お主らの突入に合わせて、
この牙で奴らの喉元を、喰い千切ってくれようぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_300_079<tab>Thank you. When our war is ended, I am certain that your lord will help us to return you all to Doma.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_300_079<tab>くれぐれも、この戦いで死場を見つけようとは思わないでください。
生きて故郷に戻ることを、ヒエン殿も望んでいるでしょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_400_079<tab>Such a curious thing, destiny, to see us meet with friends of Lord Hien in this distant corner of the world. But we shall not keep you─your day is not yet done.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_400_079<tab>フッ……相わかった……。
世話になったな、小僧、そしてエオルゼアのツワモノよ！
それでは、ご免ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_500_079<tab>Come, let us not keep our comrades waiting. We have a nation to liberate!
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_500_079<tab>よし、我々も戻り、ピピン少闘将に伝えよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_080<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_081<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_090<tab>Impeccable timing, those Domans! Come, comrades! The enemy's gate is down! <var 1A 02 /var>Forward<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_PIPIN_000_090<tab>ここに来て、ドマの民の助けが入るとは！
しかし、おかげで突破口を開くことができた……。
いよいよ、アラミゴ奪還作戦「ラールガーの軍星」も大詰めだぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>You do not think he would actually wait until the last... No, no. Of course not. He's no Vidofnir.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>まさか、ユウギリ殿だけでなく、
ヒエン殿までもが、駆けつけてくれるとは！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_AYMERIC_000_100<tab>By the Fury... Did that man just bring down flying armor with a single stroke <var 1A 02 /var>in midair<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_AYMERIC_000_100<tab>空中で、飛行型魔導アーマーを叩き斬るとは、
ドマの侍……恐るべしだな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_LUCIA_000_105<tab>The vice marshal's strategy for breaching the gates was most ingenious. A pity he did not account for the magitek armor─but to be fair, they did not account for the Domans either.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_LUCIA_000_105<tab>分厚い金属製の扉を突破するために、
呪術によって加熱してから冷却し、熱衝撃を加えるとはな……。
魔法の扱いを不得手とする帝国軍には、考えつかぬ戦法だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_106<tab>In entrusting Pipin with Tizona, I've entrusted him with command of the Flames. This time I fight not as a general, but simply a soldier.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_RAUBAHN_000_106<tab>不滅隊の指揮は、呪剣と共にピピンに託した。
ゆえに此度は将ではなく、ひとりの武人として戦おう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat the Ferae Domitae
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>人狼部隊を倒せ

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Defeat Hakuro Whitefang
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>白牙のハクロウを倒せ

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_WOLFMAN_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>If you die this day, then we shall know you for liars!
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_WOLFMAN_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>恨みはないが、どかねば斬るッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Truly...? Must we fight to prove that we need not fight!?
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>クッ……戦うしかないのか！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_102_001<tab>Until I am satisfied, we shall fight on! Give me your all!
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_102_001<tab>いざ尋常に勝負せい！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>On your guard! His strength far exceeds that of his brethren!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>この気迫……並みの剣客ではないぞ！
注意してくれ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_104_001<tab>Hah! You have faced a samurai of Doma before!
But I may yet surprise you...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_104_001<tab>ふむ……ドマの侍の技を見るのは、初めてではないな？
だが、これならどうだッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_005_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_105_001<tab>Is that all you can muster, Eorzeans!? Hold naught back!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_105_001<tab>どうした、エオルゼアの武人とは、その程度か！？
本気を出してみせよッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>Such ferocity...! If he does not relent, we shall be forced to kill him!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_002<tab>すさまじい剣気……！
出し惜しみはなしということか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKUROU_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_105_003<tab>Enough. You are every bit the warriors you claim to be.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_HAKURO_BATTLETALK_105_003<tab>ここまでで、よかろう……。
貴様たちの言葉、見極めさせてもらったぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_DEAD<tab>Confound it...
target: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_DEAD<tab>ここで……死ぬというのか……アリゼー……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>...So be it. Moonstone Carbuncle! Come!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_003<tab>こちらとて、さらなる切り札はある！
……来い、カーバンクル・ムーンストーン！

source:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>Stand within the Carbuncle's wards!
They will grant you strength!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA705_02552_ALPHINAUD_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>カーバンクルが創り出した魔紋に触れるんだ！
魔法効果を得ることができるぞ！
